Name: Austerity
Description: Return half of your gold (rounded down) to the Bank. Gain 1 Favor.

Name: Concession
Description: Permanently lose all the Banners in your hand (Banners on the board are unaffected). Gain 1 Favor.

Name: Equality
Description: Give 2 Gold to each opponent. Gain 1 Favor.

Name: Expedience
Description: When you play this, your turn ends immediately, and you will not play the Banner phase of your turn. Gain 1 Favor.

Name: Generosity
Description: Give all the Cards in your hand to other players. Gain 1 Favor.

Name: Inheritance
Description: Choose another player. They gain 2 Favor. You gain 1 Favor.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Permanently lose all of the Acolytes in your hand (Acolytes on the board are not affected). Gain 1 Favor.

Name: Totality
Description: Remove each of your Banners and Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. Gain 1 Favor.
